channel.title: Send data to HL7802
channel.description:
Hi, I have a problem with my mangoh Red. I use the good settings for my terminal emulator and when I enter AT I can't see anything. My port is the port of my IoT card and the powered LED is turn on.
Do you have an idea of where is my problem? Thank you

item.title: Send data to HL7802
item.dc:creator: quentinvalenti
item.description:
Thank you I will see

Read full topic

item.title: Send data to HL7802
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
you can see here:

Mangoh Red HL7800 Strange AT commands mangOH Red
Hello, I am trying to send AT commands to my HL7800 module on my mangoh red board, but it is acting strange… I have a TTL cable connected from my computer to pin 8 and pin 10, and USB going into CN305, GNSS and Cellular antennas and a LiPo connected. If I send AT, some times it responds with OK, and some times it responds with ERROR or some strange characters. AT OK AT IU AT ERROR AT ] AT OK My settings are 115200,N,8,1 with flow control turned off. Lastly, If I connect the UART ->…

Read full topic

item.title: Send data to HL7802
item.dc:creator: quentinvalenti
item.description:
Hi,
I have a problem with my mangoh Red. I use the good settings for my terminal emulator and when I enter AT I can’t see anything. My port is the port of my IoT card and the powered LED is turn on.

Do you have an idea of where is my problem?
Thank you
